website_summaries.verdict: Regardless of a few concerns, it's the one to choose if you want a style that can be worn by a man or woman, as it looks good on either.
pros: Lightweight build feels comfortable to wear
Comes with its own tool for adjusting the links
cons: Rare problems with the band coming loose or breaking
Gold tone numbers against the wooden face are a bit difficult to read

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful love the extra touch of wooden bracelet. The glass is clear and showcases the faceplate. Fit is perfect and not at all to big.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan L Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this watch (Black) every day for about three months now, and it's been a worthy companion. The style is attractive and looks more expensive than it is, the materials are durable, and it came with a surprise wooden bead bracelet that I also wear every day (and sometimes in my sleep...). The only thing I don't like is that the second hand and minute hand are the same color and almost the same size, so I have to look at my watch for a second longer than normal to figure out which hand is which. I've accidentally told people the wrong time because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP PLASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this a zero. The watch is cheap plastic and looked nothing like the picture. The only part of it that is 'wood" is the background of the dial. I returned this item immediately!! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied very disappointed. I was looking forward for this to come in specially because it took about 3 to 4 days. When it came in I was surprised because the look of it is very appealing. I soon found out when trying to change the time that there were inner parts that are loose. :( I know you pay for what you get but I figured this would be a different case since there were so many positive reviews. I am an honest reviewer so I wont lie about a product. This sucks.....I try to change the time and the inner face of it just spins....
customer_reviews.author: mlazareno

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, light weight watch.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for our 5 year (wood) wedding anniversary. It's very light weight and the color is a rich dark brown.I was worried that it would be cheap or cheesy, but it's a really handsome piece. It comes with a tool to remove links if needed and also came in a nicely packaged gift box. If you were considering this as a gift, go for it. The Prime 2 day delivery was delayed by a day so it made it just in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This gets noticed for the natural beauty, not the name.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wood watch and band. Once you have it on your wrist, the first thing that you'll notice is how lightweight it is. Looking at it you would expect the opposite. The beautiful wood-grain makes it distinctive. It comes large intentionally so you can adjust it to size for a perfect fit. The gold accents on the hour markings and the hands are tasteful and easy to read. Nicely boxed if you were giving as a gift and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *Updated: Nice design and feel but the band ripped
customer_reviews.text: *Update: The sellers have contacted me and are sending me a replacement band. I really like the way this watch looks and its overall design. I've had it for a while, but I kept it in the box. On sthe first day I decided to wear it, the band ended up tearing, I didn't notcie until I took it off. It completely came off shortly after.
customer_reviews.author: Yemi K.

customer_reviews.title: Best watch for allergies.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I am very allergic to most metals and leathers. So this watch is a dream to have. I work in the laboratory so my hands and wrists get wet often. The watch seems to take it well no discoloration or kinks what so ever. I would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Carey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, not the funnest to wear
customer_reviews.text: The watch face looks great. The band, however, isn’t the greatest. The underside of the band is quite rough and would rub my husband’s wrist almost raw. The watch is really lightweight so it’s perfect for someone who hates feeling things on their wrists. Just wish the band was a little better quality or the material wasn’t quite as rough on the side towards the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: A unique and nice watch for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's father's day gift. He really likes watches and has wanted a unique watch for a while. This is a very light watch and people notice it while he's wearing it. This is not a watch for everyday wear. Even at an office job, this would not be the watch you would want to always wear I would imagine. My husband has, I'd say, an average to smaller wrist, so did not need to add or take out links, which is something I worried about because most people have said they have the pins split if they've had to add or replace the links. We're really happy with this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Valentines Day, and I specifically picked this watch because it had a darker face on it. I wanted to be sure he could see the time clearly, but instead the hands of watch, blends in with the face of the watch. When I recieved it, the face of the watch is light colored, not even close to being dark like the picture shows. The watch is lightweight, and seems nicely made, but I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dallas

customer_reviews.title: A nice wood watch
customer_reviews.text: This a nice design but has its weaknesses. The silver numbers and markings do not contrast with the wood background in many lighting situations making it hard to read. I often have to twist my wrist to get the light to reflect off the numbers. The leather strap, looks plain, though I could wear it right out of the box, in contrast to my other wood watches that took time and were a hassle to take out links.
customer_reviews.author: Cliffmac

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my teen. He's not used to wearing heavy, bulky watches and has a tendency to leave those behind places. This watch looks substantial but is very lightweight and comfortable to wear. He says he forgets he's wearing it often. The color is stylish and goes with many types of outfits. We were able to easily adjust the size of the watch with the included tool as well. The watch was running when I received it, so I question how long the battery will last but that's minor. These wooden watches are all the rage, grab this one quick!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the watch!! The original leather bracelet was too large for my wrist so I had to swap it (as photo shows). The pins have a little bracket which makes the bracelet swap very easy...those little joys of life.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing I love it. One down side its that it came running :/ I hope the battery lasts.
customer_reviews.author: AlexUnboxingChannel

customer_reviews.title: Good for someone who won’t wear “often”
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my hubby on our wedding day! If you’re gifting or are someone who would wear a lot, I’d go for a higher quality watch. But for someone who will just wear it here and there, it’s perfect! Husband liked it, but did say the band left black flakes on his wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan and Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband another (much more expensive brand wood-watch) 2 years ago and the thing broke 3 times (cracked glass, then when the company fixed it the glass kept falling out, then finally after a replacement, the replacement’s numbers started falling off the face)! I was nervous to buy this one, but I wasn’t going to spend 4x the amount for that to happen again! He loves the design of this watch and hasn’t had any issues with it thus far! He knew how expensive the last one was and I’m not going to tell him this one was significantly cheaper! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, Quality and Price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 7 for groomsmen gift packages, as was a little concerned about quality but I there was no need these are a great product. They look and feel great. I would buy again and this being my first wood watch I love them they are lightweight and breathable. They guys all loved them so I would strongly recommend them. They are middle of the road on style so everyone from avid watch guys to novice watch guys all liked them.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for our 5th year anniversary to keep up with the traditional gifts (i.e wood for the 5th year). Hes a watch guy and he liked it a lot. It looks great, its lightweight and he receives a lot of compliments. If you are considering this watch, get it. It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching watch!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to try one of these wooded watches and Im glad I bought this one! The zebra wood is stunning to look at and the first day I wore it out, i got so many compliments! I decided to wear this to a corporate meeting instead of my casio watch and everyone in the room couldnt stop looking at the watch. The clasp on the watch makes it super sturdy yet its very lightweight. If you are thinking about this or maybe getting it for a christmas gift, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Lacap

customer_reviews.title: Style watch
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of this watch. Works well, lightweight...not sure about durability at this point. Seems like a good accent watch rather than an everyday watch. My wrists are small for a dude and it fits well and comes with extra links for those with larger wrists.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Watch. Love the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Very simple yet elegant. It's not very slim but it's slim, enough to be easily covered by the cuff of your dress shirt. The box it comes in always very nice, there's no need to get an additional gift box if you're thinking about gifting this to someone. I love the leather hide strap, very comfortable. Overall this is light-weight watch, perfect for wearing on the weekend, or to work everyday. Very good time piece! Would recommend to anyone wanting a switch from metal.
customer_reviews.author: Sofian Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. This is my second wooden watch like this. The last one (from a different company) was a little cheaper but lasted 2 years so I'm excited to see how this holds up. It is really light and fits great. I have small wrists and usually a watch bangs around but this stays in place all day no problem. Plus it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Spiess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch I love it! Even came with a cool little bracelet with what I assume is wooden beads? I would like more info on that. I’ve had it for a few months now. Was a little small at first so I added a link, and I may come came and add a second.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonne Seward

customer_reviews.title: Natural wood watch face is nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the wooden watch face with hour markers. I don't like the cheap looking band and will be replacing it. Keeps time nicely and not too big for a female wrist. If the band were not so chintzy I would have rated it higher.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy56

customer_reviews.title: No extra pins! Edited - they sent me extra pins and links.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. It came with 2 extra links, which is good because it does not fit as it is. But there are no extra pins. What good are the links without the pins? I still can't use it. If you send 2 extra pins, I will change this review. Update - Seller very quickly sent me extra pins and links. The watch now fits well. I love it and get many compliments on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph W. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Graduation Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a graduation gift for my boyfriend. He loves it! It's a very professional looking watch, but doesn't cost an arm and a leg. Which was really important. He has a few really nice watches that he never wears because they're a little too nice for everyday wear. He says it's a comfortable fit, but that he might need to punch an additional hole to get a better fit around his wrist. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beautiful, yet wearable watch for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable... but too dark?
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort and lightweight construction. But I also love that it's wood, and unless you get within a few inches, you can't even tell. Looks like plastic/resin unless you're close. If the wood was stained a lighter color, it might help.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Too small- customer service slow and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch but no use in buying if it does not fit. Too small for wrist. Contacted customer service multiple times for the past 3 months to receive “extra links” to make watch longer so my boyfriend could wear it, but each time they said it would be several weeks until I would receive extra links. It has been 3 months and after 2 attempts we have not received anything. Watch can’t be worn or used, so a waste of money no matter how beautiful it may look.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an option to wear on my wedding day because I wasn’t thrilled with the one I had. I was so excited by how it looked when I got it and was even happier when it was light, comfortable and amazing quality especially for the price. It went with my outfit flawlessly and I couldn’t have asked for anything better. I unfortunately lost it after the wedding but I am planning on ordering another because I loved it so much. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect a luxury watch for the price. However, I also didn't expect to get one that broke without even putting it on yet. It looks okay I suppose but overall I'd say it's not worth the time spent to purchase and then return it. I was disappointed as it looks really nice online. It's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli320

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch  :D  BUT, Hard to Adjust Band Size !  :(
customer_reviews.text: eautiful Watch ~ Extremely hard to Adjust Band via Removal of Tiny Pins in Band Segments ! ~ So far, it seems like wood will break/split IF more 'Pressure" is used to Push Pins thru Wooden Band 'Segments' ~ We are NOT unskilled in doing these things (!) Pins are just in Soo Tight, that it seems like way too much Pressure is having to be used & Pins STILL won't come out thru the Holes along Edges of Watch-Band Segments ~ We will keep trying, but may end up taking to a Jeweler (who may just end up breaking the Wood Band!) ~ Sorry, just telling the Truth about an otherwise Nice Watch (!)
customer_reviews.author: K.G. / FL

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood men's watch
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this men's watch! It comes in a wood band, and in wood colors, but I got mine in black. It is GORGEOUS!!!! I am giving mine as a gift! I tried it on and the clasp is tight fitting and easy to close. It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth f.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and looked at the watch for the first time I appreciated the quality of the workmanship. Unfortunately so did my wife, oh well she loves the watch because it is light and it does not hurt her wrist. It came with a little kit to adjust the band. It included a couple of extra links and a special tool to make the adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus...

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he's in love! The dial is easy to read, the clasp is easy to operate with one hand, and the look is impeccable! The links took some work to get out - had to take out four for his rather small wrist - but the tool that came with the watch and the directions in the pictures on Amazon did the trick. Probably took about 30-minutes to get it all sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Katye Broach

customer_reviews.title: BROKE SO SOON!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So sad to say this watch stopped working less than 50 days after purchasing with minimal use. The watch look good but not very useful if it doesnt work. NO RESPONSE FROM SELLER. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Spring R.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. There are no instructions on how to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. There are no instructions on how to remove the links... but i figured it out. Did bust one of the sides out of that link however... but thats ok. I wish the numbers and movement were either larger or not gold tone. At times they are hard to see due to they blend into the wood. Still like it thou for the price. just got it cause its wood... something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot see in the dark
customer_reviews.text: You cannot see the time in the dark per the description. That was the reason I chose it. Other than that okay for the money.
customer_reviews.author: knitfelt

customer_reviews.title: Wooden ya know, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. I have to wait cause it’s a Christmas gift but he is gonna love it. Also sorry for the wife joke on the title, I couldn’t resist haha. Buy this it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Becky Harris

customer_reviews.title: It has two extra links, and a tool included.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find out info on this watch before buying it was a nightmare. But I took a chance and ended up really liking it. I come with 2 extra links wish it said that in the description!!! If you have an extra large man you will need more extra links.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Classic look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable leather watch. It’s lightweight and something you could wear everyday. Don’t love the name Uwood but other than that it’s good value for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: BROKE - Quickly - sadly
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this good looking watch stopped working within 4 month of light use. (Only wore it every so often.) Yet!! The company was very courteous and graciously refunded the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Spring R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch! I’m a woodworker and could never make ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch! I’m a woodworker and could never make this watch but thought I should have a wood watch. Well made and very nice, I have had many positive comments. I know it’s not water proof but have accidentally worn it in the shower...still works fine. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broke before I even had a chance to wear it.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this one. I opened it up, set the time, and then stored it very nicely in a case with all of my other watches, and just a few weeks later when I decide to wear it out, the second hand keeps getting stuck. Even as a cheap watch, this isn't worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, but band didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: If you like wood watches, the face on this one is quite nice. But as the headline implies, don't count on the band being around too long.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display and color
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal watch. Beautiful display and color, well worth the money. I really like the leather band, nice and doesn't feel like it'll fall apart too soon. One star down because the thing that holds the excess band is a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: AustinBrook5

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, cheap strap.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am impressed by the look and feel of the watch, however the wrist strap is noticably cheap and will sometimes snap out of place. The watch face is beautiful and looks as pictured. For the price this may be expected, and I plan to replace the strap with something sturdier. Overall a decent watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Master

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty in person, love the striped wood grain
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really pretty in person, I love the striped wood grain! It appears to be quite well made. In it's little gift box it's really a nice buy at under $35 - makes a nice gift for a man or a woman. The wood is very smooth and silky to the touch. I think my dad is really going to like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ad n' Audie

customer_reviews.title: Band only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Update - After submitting this feedback I was immediately contacted by the seller, BIOSTON, and they were able to work with me over a few days to resolve the broken band. Have not had any issues since. I would have used a more direct method to contact the seller if it was available. Bought this watch for my son as a Christmas gift. Watch band broke around the end of February or beginning of March and is unrepairable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Quality & Durability
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas 2017 and he absolutely loved it. By May 2018, the band had broken where it connects to the face and is not repairable. Very disappointed as this is a gorgeous watch. It seems to lack in quality and durability. I tried to file a claim for repair with Asurion, the amazon watch warranty company, but they do not cover band.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Four

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its not as bulky as other wood watches. Compared to other wood watches, this one has better material all around. Its very comfortable. Fits smaller and larger sized wrists. the second band stays in place and does not move off of the extra strap.
customer_reviews.author: GrantClan

customer_reviews.title: Port quality band but watch face is nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it’s materials are of poor quality. It was a gift and ce in a cool box but I wouldn’t buy had I seen it in person because the band really sucked. The watch face is really cool though.
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING wooden watches
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this. Great leather, great quality, great wood. Came in amazing condition with wonderful packaging and my lovely man adored it as well!! Truly would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timeless piece
customer_reviews.text: This watch came ready to go in a pretty gift box. It is beautifully made and looks more expensive then it actually is. Which made it a perfect gift :P . The recipient who already has similar coloured sunglasses was overjoyed and was happy about the "timeless" graduation watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and the links are super easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this every day since I've purchased it. It's lightweight and the links are super easy to adjust. Update June 2019-I literally wear this watch everyday and have gotten so many compliments. I love that it doesn't make my wrist sweat like other watch materials do. The only issue I have now is that I have worn out the link that holds the face of the watch to the band and it split, just like decaying wood does, but I'm happy to buy a new one and I may try to find a replacement link.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love the real wood. Its really cool. the look and build quality are much better than i expected for such a budget watch
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Shirley

customer_reviews.title: + Great looking watch for price point! - A little difficult to remove links.
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks really great and has a nice rustic look to it. My only issue is that it is not that easy to remove the links to resize to one's wrist. The watch does come with instructions and tools for this, but it is very difficult to tell which side of the watch to insert the tool. Make sure to remove the little plastic spacer on the dial and push in the dial to start the watch -- I thought mine wasn't working at first.
customer_reviews.author: Charioteer

customer_reviews.title: I love the wood look!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this watch as a gift and he’s obsessed with it. It looks like one of those really expensive wood watches!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a simple wear look
customer_reviews.text: Band is a little cheap, but that is to be expected. The bracelet it comes with is cute and the watch face looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Scene Stealer
customer_reviews.text: It's a no nonsense wristwatch which s what I need, but oh what a stylish one! Got many attentions from people who've seen it.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an anniversary gift for my husband and he still wears it! Beautiful quality and great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy & Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to my friend in Texas and he loves it it came with a bonus wood bead bracelet. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Burke

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my dad and he thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my dad and he thought it was really unique. He loves the wooden face. There is a thin film protecting the watch face, so don’t forget to remove it :)
customer_reviews.author: wysoke01

customer_reviews.title: Teenager approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my son. He has a very nice watch but I wanted a cool everyday one for him. He loves this and it looks “cool.” Teenage boys are tough! ;)
customer_reviews.author: C. Niem

customer_reviews.title: Wood Watch is a real compliment getter. I have more expensive watches, but this one gets noticed.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very durable considering I did not have to break the bank to own it. The thing is, it keeps great time, and is a real nice looking watch that will have people asking about it. This time piece is unique and a conversation starter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the price it’s dope
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for I long time I wear it like ever day for the abuse it takes everyday it’s grate at first the “leather Band” was uncomfortable on the wrist, it would leave a black residue on my wrist until like after a week of owning it. The leather band is starting to rip were the notch is to remove the band. To this day the watch still tells time the glass is untouched but over all the watch is amazing for its price plus it comes with a cool bracelet
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful watch although a but itchy
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful looking watch although it is a bit itchy and the cover is made of plastic. This will make a great gift to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a small watch tool to take a link out or adjust
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the watch for my nephew and I wasn't disappointed by his reaction! HE WAS VERY HAPPY AND NOT EXPECTING IT ! Very happy with it my birthday surprise for a cool nephew.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with the look of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the look of this watch. Very well packaged and it comes with a complimentary bracelet and tiny screwdriver. Only "downfall" is that it's very lightweight. Don't be fooled, it's very well made and I don't think it will easily break, but the watch "feels" fragile. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Here and now
customer_reviews.text: What time is it? According to my woody it's sexy o'clock! Cant keep the ladies off of me! This thing is a chick magnet which is ironic since its wood, and thus absolutely no attractant minerals whatsoever unless the chicks were female termites. Am I right?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This watch exceeded my expectations. I bought it for a gift and was surprised with the quality and look of it, packaging was really nice. It looks and feels really good quality, seems great for everyday use. The person I gave it to loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla C.

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday watch - good for casual dressers but can also look fancy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend; he says it’s comfortable and likes that he can dress it up or down (mostly down lol). He’s gotten some unsolicited compliments on it too so I think it’s a winner! I actually want to buy the watch for myself but don’t want to look like a copy cat haha
customer_reviews.author: Latesia Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Good watch. Bad strap. Bad advertising.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but I am kinda upset at the inaccurate advertising. The band is an 18mm, not a 20mm as advertised, and the band is also barely cowhide. The top layer is definitely plastic and it might be coating really cheap animal fiber. That doesn't count. And I highly doubt will hold up. The watch itself is pretty nice looking though. I got the black one. It just looks kinda strange to have a silver clasp on a watch with gold accents in the face... Good watch unit, bad strap.
customer_reviews.author: Brigham Bitner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new watch, it looks exactly like it does in the photo, and came with batteries. Exactly what I was looking for, and shipping was right on time. Even came with a cute wood bead bracelet that goes amazingly with it. All in all, greatly satisfied. As for the photo, I have bad lighting, sorry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Evans

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to see the hands
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch - lightweight and attractive. However, if I could access the insides, I would color the hands to contrast the background. Gold colored hands don't go well with a light colored background - hard to see with certain lighting. The watch face is nothing like the one in the picture. Mine is more of a tan color which does not contrast with the gold tone hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarker

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a week. Looked great but was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ZacAndShawnie

customer_reviews.title: Unique men's watch - looks great with a suit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and it's classy, not overly large but stylish. Looks slick - I ended up purchasing a different style of watch for myself from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Kirk Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight/Classy
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight and fancy watch. It comes large with extra links on it for big guys; if you need to, it comes with a little screw driver to take links out for smaller wrists. I've had a lot of compliments on this watch, for the price it is an amazing buy, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever for your man!
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful crafted thing my eyes have ever seen! I was looking for the perfect gift to give my significant other for our anniversary. He fell in love with it! Thought it was so awesome. Wore it right away. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for a Gift, I might get one for myself now.
customer_reviews.text: My best men and groomsmen loved this watch. I bought 7 of them and they all were in great condition and the guys are still wearing them almost a month later. It looked amazing when it came out of the box and it came with a beaded bracelet as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Stylish watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the style of watch, this is a great price. Very fashionable wooden design with a sleek and simple strap. Easy to change the time. It definitely needs a thicker material for the band though. Not the thickest.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband. He loved it. It was so inexpensive, I'm not sure how long it will last, but it doesn't look cheap at all. It has a leather strap, which my husband likes and the face of the watch is wooden and very simple. It looked just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: michele kmak

customer_reviews.title: Peacock design in accent colors
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to distinguish the background for from the hour hand and minute hand other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Gist

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: It is really a nice watch, my husband gets a lot of compliments on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Ford

customer_reviews.title: really striking
customer_reviews.text: beautiful watch Love the wood, very different from most watches.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Herman

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my stepdads birthday because he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stepdads birthday because he loves watches and enjoys woodcrafting in his free time! The quality for the price is incredible. Will likely purchase another for my brother’s Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Koger

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant even remotely. I washed my hands and water leaked in. Looks nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E

customer_reviews.title: good little cheap watch
customer_reviews.text: good little cheap watch, light and fits. Not metal so I don't have to worry about conductivity issues at work. and so far it keeps good time too.
customer_reviews.author: Larrykh465

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I've bought something on Amazon that I'll like so much. I'm not much of a watch lover. But this one really captivated my attention from the first moment. And it didn't disappoint me
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but physically impossible to resize.
customer_reviews.text: Broke almost instantly out of package (despite) being extremely gently. I may return or just attempt to glue as it's a smallish chuck that fell off near the face. Physically impossible to resize the band which is way too small for most males but fine for a petit wrist. Looks fantastic, I'll give it that but unfortunate it essentially only comes in one size due to the inability to resize.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Cox

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful conversation piece and it keeps good time
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rybikowsky

customer_reviews.title: He's worn it nearly every day for over 2 months now and it's still in perfect condition. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it. He receives compliments on it all the time. He's worn it nearly every day for over 2 months now and it's still in perfect condition. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and works great
customer_reviews.text: delivered fast and priced great looks like an expensive watch wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Don Peters

customer_reviews.title: Fair good watch.
customer_reviews.text: Original piece of watch. Not so fancy, not so bad. If you are looking to add a watch wood to your collection, this would be a good piece with good price. Package was great and they added another wood accessories which was a kind gesture.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet Örgev

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy strap
customer_reviews.text: Strap is very flimsy, i doubt it will last too long considering I wear this to work as a food runner. Also, the wood grain is very dark and it's hard to tell that the watch is wooden unless you're in direct bright light. It still looks nice though and I like the bracelet that it came with
customer_reviews.author: deerlow

customer_reviews.title: Stunning would buy 100x
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning watch. The details are so intricate, very light weight, and very durable. My dad wears it all the time and hasn’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hennon

customer_reviews.title: Classy but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Love how dark the finish is on this watch. Does not feel very durable but will make a good dress watch for special occasions. Engraved our wedding date on it and gifted it on 5th(wood) anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Williams

customer_reviews.title: A nice watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great, I've received compliments after only a couple days of wearing it out. It looks as pictured, so you won't be met with any surprises when it comes in the mail. It's comfortable around the wrist and pretty light weight. The quality is pretty nice and the wood is smooth to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Asher Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Please spell check your items.....
customer_reviews.text: The watch was beautiful and the bracelet was a nice bonus, compliments the watch nicely.....however the side of the box was quite embarrassing on Christmas morning due to a misprint, which has caused quite a few lewd jokes due to me not noticing "Wood Watch, BIOSTON U ...isex With Adjust Tool" But once it was being read aloud in front of all family, then terrible jokes were plentiful and all the jokes aside, my husband truly loved it. But between isex, UWOOD, and Natural HARD Wood...it's all a bit much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Drizzt the gaming elf

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got this for ny husband for Christmas. Loves it. Super light. He has a large wrist and the extra links were enough to make it fit. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: angela shields

feature_bullets: ☛Quality Materials: Eco-Friendly And Hypo-Allergenic---BIOSTON knows the importance of quality. The watches are created using durable materials that are made to last,all wood comes from reliable sources and is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council. (✔)BIOSTON wood watches are handcrafted with 100% natural wood without paint or chemicals, making them hypo-allergenic and suitable for people with sensitive skin. High-quality mineral crystal glass protects the natural wood dial and won’t scrat
☛Fashion & Casual Style :Casual and minimalist, this wrist watch is of high quality with a simple and stylish outlook.You can wear it when in office, school, friend’s party, coffee shop and so on.
☛Adjustable Band & Watch Boxes:1xwooden watch,1xwatch cases,1xadjust tool;easy to change the men’s watches band size;Folding clasp with safety,very convenient to take on and off

☛Perfect Gift Ideas - BIOSTON watches were designed for men. However, women that like large faced watches will love them too. It can be a great gift to family, friends or yourself. A Best Gift choice for Xmas,thanksgiving day,Hollywood,birthday,wedding,anniversary.

☛Best Guarantee: We think you will LOVE your BIOSTON watch; however, we want you to be happy with your purchase! If there is a problem with your product we would love the chance to make it right. If you have simply changed your mind please return it for a full refund. It's that simple.
